Judul: PERUMUSAN STRATEGI BISNIS UNTUK PERUSAHAAN LAUNDRY INDUSTRI FINISHING DAN PENCELUPAN UNTUK BERTAHAN  DI INDUSTRI FASHION:  KASUS PT. JOEN MODE PASIR INDO
Abstrak:
Many local and foreign businessmen who build garment companies in Indonesia take into account the benefits gained from these business lines. Sometimes the garment industry experiences ups and downs of the growth of the fashion industry business with a variety of factors experienced.
PT. Joen Mode Pasirindo is a finishing and dyeing garment company in Bogor district, which offers clothes washing and dyeing services for export and local markets which are more focused on washing jeans. In the last 2 years, the number of export orders has decreased by 50% of total demand in 2016. This is the impact of many internal and external factors from the decline in the garment industry in Indonesia due to losing the competition with other countries, expensive raw material prices, energy consumption, up to labor costs.
The decline in orders is a business obstacle faced by PT. Joen Mode Pasirindo unstable growth and profitability.
In an effort to find business solutions for companies, the strategy formulation techniques in this study were integrated into a three-stage decision-making framework. Stage one, called the Input Stage, consists of the EFE Matrix, IFE Matrix, and Competitive Profile Matrix (CPM). External factors are obtained from PESTEL analysis and Porter's Five Forces Analysis, while internal factors are through interviews. Stage two is called Matching Stage, SWOT will be a reference analysis to see the company's current position on the SPACE Matrix which will get some suggested solutions. The results of the analysis are analyzed again through the QSPM count in the third stage called Decision Stage to determine the priority scale of these strategies. From the results of the study, the most appropriate strategy for PT. Joen Mode Pasirindo is developing products to increase company revenue. Not only as a finishing and dyeing company but companies need to start selling goods to consumers directly.
In conclusion, PT. Joen Mode Pasirindo in a weak competitive position in the conditions of competitive market growth. A conservative condition is where the company does not take excessive risks. The right strategies that can be done by companies are market penetration, market development, product development, and related diversification.
Kata Kunci: IFE Matrix, EFE Matrix, CPM, SPACE Matrix and QSPM
